markdown: Went for a 9km #walk in "Kroondomein Het Loo", a park-like estate owned by the king (the state, really), with my mom. But only thought of taking a #picture once.. Most of the bright #autumn colours are gone and I wasn't very fond of the 'zigzaggin' of the #trail. But I guess you'd have to if you want to squeeze a route that long into an oversized #park. Will have to try again during spring.
